name: Build A City Block
description:
A simple but addictive blocks game.

Build city landscapes by filling district zones with blocks. Once filled, a district provides points used to construct new buildings.
Raise city unqiue landmarks by collecting special stars.
Increase your score and collect coins.

Play on multiple city maps : Manhattan, Montreal, Toronto and San Francisco.



Notes, this is NOT a City Building game, just to be clear ;)
